data.name: The Courier
data.detailed_description:
The Courier is an open world game about running a mail delivery business on a mysterious island. The more letters you deliver, the more you uncover the island's secrets. Explore a vibrant living world, make use of various vehicles to travel around, do tons of challenges, and complete a compelling and mysterious main storyline.



- The Courier is an exciting adventure that features open world exploration and letter delivering on various islands with over 8 hours of gameplay.
​
- Interesting storyline, environmental puzzles, mini games and more.

​- Unravel the dark secrets of the island of Orda. Explore a huge world by boat or by foot, and deliver the mail!

data.short_description: The Courier is an open world game about running a mail delivery business on a mysterious island. The more letters you deliver, the more you uncover the island's secrets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home Edition (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 960
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Pro Edition (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i7 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated or dedicated DirectX 9 compatible sound card

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
